original_text: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest.
korean_text: 나는 말하기를 만일 내게 비둘기 같이 날개가 있다면 날아가서 편히 쉬리로다

sentences.original_text: Oh that I had wings like a dove!
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 내게 비둘기 같은 날개가 있다면!

sentences.original_text: for then would I fly away
